description:
NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENT

Note: Due to the impacts to the COVID-19 Pandemic, reduced business hours and limited staff available at the specified bid receiving Unit, on the front page of the Bid Solicitation document, bidders are strongly encouraged to transmit their bids electronically using the epost Connect service instead of any of the other methods of bid delivery usually available.

The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below.

Item 2, GSIN: : 1670 NSN: : 1670-20-004-2665, Activator Parachute, Automatic
Part No.: ML3121000, NCAGE: L3969
Quantity: 50 Unit of Issue: EA, to be delivered to CAAWC Trenton.

Item 3, GSIN: 1670, NSN: 1670-12-364-7302, Filter Element
Part No.: 900004, NCAGE: C5088
Quantity: 400, Unit of Issue: EA, to be delivered to CAAWC Trenton.

Bidders proposing an Equivalent or a Substitute Product must indicate the brand name and model and/or Part Number and the NCAGE they are offering.

The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
duration_in_months: The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
full_summary:
# Tender Announcement

## Tender Details

* **Title (English)**: Cypress
* **Title (French)**: Cyprès
* **Reference Number**: cb-7740-92791502
* **Amendment Number**: 2
* **Solicitation Number**: W8485-247736/B
* **Publication Date**: July 31, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: August 30, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST

## Expected Contract Dates

* **Expected Contract Start Date**: August 31, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: March 29, 2024

## Status

* **Tender Status (English)**: Expired
* **Tender Status (French)**: Expiré

## Goods and Service

* **UNSPSC Code**: 25201904
* **Description**: Parachutes
* **Trade Agreements**: 
	+ Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
	+ Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
	+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
	+ Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
	+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

## End Use

* **End Use**: Defence and Military Equipment

## Contact Info

* **Name**: Dany Lebel
* **Email**: dany.lebel2@forces.gc.ca
* **Phone**: (000) 000-0000
* **Address**: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2

## Notice and Attachment

* **Notice URL**: Not available
* **Attachment URL**:
	+ English: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7740/w8485-247736.a---bid-solicitation-%28en-canada-buys.pdf
	+ French: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7740/w8485-247736.a---bid-solicitation-%28fr-achats-canada.pdf
